Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.api.services.parameterbuilders

Interface ParameterBuilderInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ParameterBuilder
public interface ParameterBuilderInterface
An interface for parameter builders.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object[]
    buildParameters(Parameter[] methodParameters, List<ConstraintParameter<?>> constraintParameters)
    Builds an array of parameters based on the method parameters and constraint parameters.

  • Method Details

    • buildParameters

      Object[] buildParameters(Parameter[] methodParameters, List<ConstraintParameter<?>> constraintParameters) throws UndefinedConstraintParameterException, NotEnoughParametersException
      Builds an array of parameters based on the method parameters and constraint parameters.
      Parameters:
      methodParameters - the parameters of a method.
      constraintParameters - the list of constraint parameters.
      Returns:
      an array of objects representing the built parameters.
      Throws:
      UndefinedConstraintParameterException - if a needed parameter is undefined or missing.
      NotEnoughParametersException - if there are not enough arguments provided for the instantiation of a concrete constraint.
